name: Handicraft villages and Vietnam Ancient Pagodas
description:
Let’s spend a day visiting handicraft villages Bat Trang, Dong Ho around Hanoi which are famous for their painting, pottery, and woodwork, are an exciting point of Vietnamese culture that should not be missed. But Thap Pagoda, and Dau Pagoda is two of the oldest pagodas in Vietnam which reveal the long-time intersection of Buddhism and Vietnamese manners.
Take this trip out of Hanoi to the surrounding villages on a full-day tour that brings you up close to the artistic and spiritual aspects of Vietnamese culture.
Highlights:
Experience the most famous traditional villages including the pottery village
Watch the artisans forming, painting, and glazing their products
See the traditional painting village of Dong Ho
Visit But Thap Pagoda and Dau Pagoda
